title: Verify: Selecting WWE Network Channel successfully opens WWE Network
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed the WWE Network on the Xbox 360
AND is connected to "Xbox Live"
AND has added the "WWE Network" Channel
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "WWE Network" Channel from the Xbox menu
custom_expected: THEN the "WWE Network" will open successfully

title: Verify: WWE Network can be accessed while the Xbox is connected wirelessly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Xbox device is currently connected to a wireless network
AND the "WWE Network" channel is installed
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "WWE Network" Channel from the Xbox menu
custom_expected: THEN the "WWE Network" will open successfully

title: Verify: WWE can be accessed while the Xbox is connected using a wired connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Xbox 360 is currently connected to a wired network connection
AND the WWE Network channel is installed
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the WWE Network Channel from the Xbox menu
custom_expected: THEN the WWE Network will open successfully

title: Login: Verify Member Sign-In screen appears
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network channel
AND we have not previously logged into an account in the channel
custom_steps: WHEN we access the WWE Network
custom_expected: THEN we will be presented with a Member Sign In screen

title: Login: Verify Login success
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network channel
AND we have not previously logged into an account
custom_steps:
WHEN we access the WWE Network channel
AND we enter valid WWE credentials
custom_expected:
THEN the credentials will be accepted 
AND we will brought to the WWE Network Home Screen

title: Login: Verify Login failed
refs: FInd out if error message will include Forget Password info
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network channel
AND we have not previously logged into an account in the channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we access the WWE Network channel
AND we enter invalid WWE credentials
custom_expected:
THEN a Login Error Screen will appear
AND a message regarding 'Invalid email or password' will be stated
AND all formatting and text will be readable
AND a Close button will be present

title: Login: Verify text and formatting are clear and readable
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network Channel
AND we are on the Login Screen
custom_steps:
WHEN we look at the Text
AND we look at the buttons
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the text is spelled correctly on the page
AND each label is formatted correctly

title: Login: Verify pressing the Back button from the Login Screen returns user back to the last tile the user selected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network Channel
AND we have entered the Login Screen
custom_steps:
WHEN we are on the Login Screen
AND select the Back button
custom_expected:
THEN we will be brought back to the Cold Start Screen
AND we will be able to press the "" to go back into the login screen

custom_steps: WHEN the WWE Network Channel is accessed
custom_expected: THEN the user will be brought to the Home Screen

GIVEN we have installed the WWE Channel

custom_steps: WHEN we traverse the Home Screen options
custom_expected:
THEN all text will be formatted correctly
AND all thumbnails will appear without issue

custom_steps: ![](index.php?/attachments/get/914)

'Continue Watching' and "Watchlist' thumbnails display on Home Screen to the right of the ON NOW tile.

(Xbox 360) If no items have been added to lists: thumbnails display default images
If lists have been started, the service returns images associated with the bookmarked content.

title: Verify text and formatting are clear and readable
custom_preconds: Continue Watching and Watchlist items must be added to user's test account.
custom_steps: Confirm the text is readable and formatted correctly within the tiles (bottom two)
custom_expected: Text font, size and formatting should be consistent and fit within the designed space. (bottom two tiles to the right of the ON NOW tile)

title: Verify ON NOW/Linear presentation of VOD program is not bookmarked
custom_preconds: ON NOW program should not already be in the current user test account's Watchlist or Continue Watching list.
custom_steps:
1. Note ON NOW program.
2. Launch ON NOW > NOW
3. Let play for 10+ seconds.
4. Exit via BACK.
custom_expected:
Current program should not appear in:

1. HOME carousel Watchlist/Continue Watching
1. MY ACCOUNT Watchlist/Continue Watching

title: Verify ON NOW/Watch From Beginning presentation of VOD program is bookmarked
custom_preconds: ON NOW program should not already be in the current user test account's Watchlist or Continue Watching list.
custom_steps:
1. Note ON NOW program.
2. Launch ON NOW > FROM BEGINNING
3. Let play for 10+ seconds.
4. Exit via BACK.
custom_expected:
Current program should appear in:

HOME carousel Watchlist/Continue Watching
MY ACCOUNT Watchlist/Continue Watching

[Note: Improvements logged in JIRA to address limits of ON NOW/From Beginning launch when bookmarked program is currently playing]

title: Verify Linear Live/Ghost programs are not bookmarked
custom_preconds:
ON NOW program should not already be in the current user test account's Watchlist or Continue Watching list.
ON NOW program should be confirmed a Live event and that From Beginning will launch Ghost version.
custom_steps:
1. Note ON NOW program.
2. Launch ON NOW > FROM BEGINNING
3. Let play for 10+ seconds.
4. Exit via BACK.
custom_expected:
Current program should not appear in:

1. HOME carousel Watchlist/Continue Watching
1. MY ACCOUNT Watchlist/Continue Watching

title: Verify enabling parental controls will hide (yet preserve) restricted content from user’s Continue Watching list in Home Carousel
custom_preconds: Test account should be set with parental controls OFF and ONLY ONE TV-14 or higher rated item in Continue Watching.
custom_steps:
1. Confirm TV-14 or higher item appear in Continue Watching carousel thumb.
2. Quit app.
3. Through user account (via WWE Network site) change account to "Parental Controls ON" and save settings.
4. Relaunch Xbox 360.
5. Confirm TV-14 or higher Continue Watching carousel item does not appear.
6. Quit app.
7. Through user account (via WWE Network site) change account to "Parental Controls OFF" and save settings.
8. Relaunch Xbox 360.
9. Confirm TV-14 or higher Continue Watching carousel item appears as expected as seen in step 1.
custom_expected: Enabling parental controls will hide restricted content from user’s Continue Watching on Home Carousel and disabling enabling parental controls will reveal the same content.

title: Verify enabling parental controls will hide (yet preserve) restricted content from user’s Watchlist in Home Carousel
custom_preconds: Test account should be set with parental controls OFF and ONLY ONE TV-14 or higher rated item in Watchlist.
custom_steps:
1. Confirm TV-14 or higher item appears in Watchlist carousel thumb.
2. Quit app.
3. Through user account (via WWE Network site) change account to "Parental Controls ON" and save settings.
4. Relaunch Xbox 360.
5. Confirm TV-14 or higher Watchlist carousel item does not appear.
6. Quit app.
7. Through user account (via WWE Network site) change account to "Parental Controls OFF" and save settings.
8. Relaunch Xbox 360.
9. Confirm TV-14 or higher Watchlist carousel item appears as expected as seen in step 1.
custom_expected: Enabling parental controls will hide restricted content from user’s Watchlist on Home Carousel and disabling enabling parental controls will reveal the same content.

title: Verify empty Watchlists and Continue Watching lists display in Home Carousel if no items have been added
custom_expected:
Default thumbnails display on tiles (WWE network logo)
Empty lists display text "No items yet"

title: Verify: "Generic Catchall" message for blacked out content
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has launched the app
AND successfully logged into the WWE Network with an entitled account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user attempts to access a VOD
AND the content is blacked out
AND the user is in a blacked out location
AND the blacked out content's HEADLINE and/or SHOW_NAME are unknown

Test ALL entry points:
- Network Home Screen
- Show page
- Schedule
- Search > "Most Popular"
- Watchlist
- (TBD-needs confirmation) Continue Watching (this should not be possible to get a blacked out content in the CW list, but if someone moved to a blackout country after creating a CW list it could happen)
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive the message below
AND the asset will NOT play
AND the user will remain on the page they started on.

*Content Unavailable*
*This episode is currently not available in your area. For more information on WWE Network blackout rules, visit wwe.com/blackout.*

AND a Back button will be below the body of the message.

WHEN the Back button is selected
THEN the message will hide 
AND the user will be returned to the page from where the video launch was attempted from.

title: Scenario: User is already in live stream when blacked-out content starts to air
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app
And successfully logged into the WWE Network with an entitled account
And has launched the linear stream when the content had no blackout restrictions
custom_steps:
When the program transitions to either a blacked out episode in a series
OR a blacked out live PPV event
OR a blacked out piece of content where the TITLE and the SHOW_NAME are unknown
AND the user is in a blacked out location
(Verify all scenarios)
custom_expected:
Then the video playback will stop; video/audio will not be observed/heard
AND the user will receive one of the following messages:
Episodes in a Series:
"Content Unavailable
This episode of SHOW_NAME  is currently not available in your area. For more information on WWE Network blackout rules, visit wwe.com/blackout."

PPV Live Events: 
"Content Unavailable
TITLE is currently not available in your area. For more information on WWE Network blackout rules, visit wwe.com/blackout."
     
Generic Catchall:
"Content Unavailable
This episode is currently not available in your area. For more information on WWE Network blackout rules, visit wwe.com/blackout."
     
AND an OK button will be below the body of the message.

WHEN the OK button is selected
THEN the message will hide and the user will be returned to where the video was launched from (WWE 'Home' view or 'Schedule > Today' depending on where the content was accessed from).


*NOTE: Some developers are noting that the expected in this case is to always show the Generic Message, confirmation has not been received.*

title: Scenario: User tries to access live stream from app Home Screen while blacked-out content is airing
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app
And successfully logged into the WWE Network with an entitled account
custom_steps:
When the user attempts to access the linear stream from the app Home Screen
AND the content is blacked out
AND the blacked out content is an episode in a series
OR a blacked out live PPV event (either "On Now" or Ghost/Spanish Event)
OR a blacked out piece of content where the TITLE and the SHOW_NAME are unknown
AND the user is in a blacked out location
(Verify all scenarios)
custom_expected:
Then the user will be prevented from viewing the blacked out content 
AND will receive one of the following messages:

Episodes in a Series:
"Content Unavailable
This episode of SERIES_NAME is currently not available in your area. For more information on WWE Network blackout rules, visit wwe.com/blackout."

PPV Live Events:
"Content Unavailable
SHOW_NAME is currently not available in your area. For more information on WWE Network blackout rules, visit wwe.com/blackout."

Generic Catchall:
"Content Unavailable
This episode is currently not available in your area. For more information on WWE Network blackout rules, visit wwe.com/blackout."

AND a Back button will be below the body of the message.

WHEN the Back button is selected
THEN the message will hide 
AND the WWE Home screen will be displayed.

Given the user has launched the app

custom_expected:

Episodes in a Series:

PPV Live Events:
"Content Unavailable
TITLE is currently not available in your area. For more information on WWE Network blackout rules, visit wwe.com/blackout."

Generic Catchall:
"Content Unavailable
This episode is currently not available in your area. For more information on WWE Network blackout rules, visit wwe.com/blackout."

AND a Back button will be below the body of the message.

WHEN the Back button is selected
THEN the message will hide 
AND the Schedule > Today screen will be displayed.

title: Scenario: User can access live stream again from Schedule > Today page after blacked-out content is off the air

Given the user has launched the app
And successfully logged into the WWE Network with an entitled account
custom_steps:
When the user attempts to access the linear stream from the Schedule > Today page
AND the current content is not blacked out for the user's location
AND the previous content was blacked out
custom_expected:
Then the user should be able to access the stream without issue regardless of location
(Check the following locations: UK, India, US)

title: Scenario: User can access live stream again from app Home Screen after blacked-out content is off the air
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app
And successfully logged into the WWE Network with an entitled account
custom_steps:
When the user attempts to access the linear stream from the app Home Screen
AND the current content is not blacked out for the user's location
AND the previous content was blacked out
custom_expected:
Then the user should be able to access the stream without issue regardless of location

title: Scenario: User is in Live stream, but is not at Live point (has scanned back before the 'Live' point) when blacked-out content starts to air
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app
And successfully logged into the WWE Network with an entitled account
And has launched the linear stream when the content had no blackout restrictions
And seeks back to the beginning of the sliding DVR window (1 hour back)
custom_steps:
When the user watches the video for a while
And Meanwhile, a new program starts that is blacked-out
And then the user scrubs to the live position
custom_expected:
Then the user will receive one of the following message:

Generic Catchall:
"Content Unavailable
This episode is currently not available in your area. For more information on WWE Network blackout rules, visit wwe.com/blackout."

AND a Back button will be below the body of the message.

WHEN the Back button is selected
THEN the message will hide and the user will be returned to where the video was launched from (WWE 'Home' view or 'Schedule > Today' depending on where the content was accessed from).

title: Scenario: User tries to access blacked out content that is running back to back with another blacked content of the same rule (or different B.O. rule)
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched the app
And successfully logged into the WWE Network with an entitled account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user attempts to launch the EPG content
AND the content is blacked out so they are prevented from viewing the content
AND they receive the appropriate blackout message
AND they wait until the current program ends and then attempts to watch the next program
AND the content is blacked out
custom_expected:
THEN they will continue to be prevented from viewing the content 
AND will receive the appropriate Blackout message.

title: Scenario: User attempts to watch India blacked out content while in India
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is located in India
AND has launched the app
AND successfully logged into the WWE Network with an entitled account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user tries to launch a VOD blacked out for India
e.g., a PPV which aired within the last 72 hours (original air date + 48 hours)

Test ALL entry points:
- Network Home Screen
- Show page
- Search
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive one of the messages below
AND the VOD will NOT play
AND the user will remain on the page they started on.

*Episodes in a Series:*
*"Content Unavailable*
*This episode of SHOW_NAME is currently not available in your area. For more information on WWE Network blackout rules, visit wwe.com/blackout."*

*PPV Live Events:*
*"Content Unavailable*
*HEADLINE is currently not available in your area. For more information on WWE Network blackout rules, visit wwe.com/blackout."*

*Generic Catchall:*
*"Content Unavailable*
*This episode is currently not available in your area. For more information on WWE Network blackout rules, visit wwe.com/blackout."*

title: Paywall: When the user enters the app, the user is placed on the Home screen instead of a cold start screen
Paywall: When the user tries to watch the Live Linear and isn't signed in, then the user is greeted with a upsell screen
Paywall: When the user tries to watch a VOD and isn't signed in, then the user is greeted with an upsell screen
Paywall: When the user tries to watch the Live Linear and is signed in, then the user is able to watch
Paywall: When the user tries to watch a VOD and is signed in, then the user is able to watch
Upsell: When the user selects Sign in button on the upsell screen, then the user is brought to the Log in screen
Upsell: When the user leaves the Log in screen after hitting the upsell, then the user is brought back to the upsell screen
Upsell: When the user logs in after getting the upsell, then the app launches the VOD/Live Linear
Upsell: Verify text and formatting are clear and readable
Collect: On the Shows page: there is a new tile called Collections for the user to select
Collect: When the user selects the collection's tile, then the user will be brought to the collection's page
Collect: Verify text and formatting are clear and readable
Collect: If the user selects any of the collections located on the page, then the user will be brought to a carousel page filled with clips
Collect: When the user selects a clip and is already signed in, then the user is shown said clip
Collect: If the user isn't signed in and selects a clip from collections, then the user is given the upsell message
Gesture: Verify that the User can hover any tile on-screen and it will press said title, bringing the user to the next screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the "WWE Network" channel is installed
AND we have already logged into the WWE Network with an account
AND the Kinect is turned on
AND the Kinect recognizes the user
custom_steps:
When we hover over a tile on any of the tiles located in Home
AND we wait for the circle around the hand to fill

Test Entry Points:
- Shows
- Schedule
- Search
custom_expected: Then the tile is pressed and it will bring the user to the next screen

title: Gesture: While watching a broadcast, the user is able to use the media controls to navigate the video on-screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the "WWE Network" channel is installed
AND we have already logged into the WWE Network with an account
AND the Kinect is turned on
AND the Kinect recognizes the user
AND we are watching a video in progress
custom_steps:
When the user hovers over top of the screen where the media controls are

Test Points:
- Dragging the Playback start position
- Pause
- Exit
custom_expected: The user is able to use the controls without hassle from the app

title: ***Gesture: During the upsell, the user is able to navigate into and out of the upsell page, as well as, select any button on the screen
Voice: User says "Xbox" while on the Home screen and is then greeted with visual voice commands that are displayed clearly to said user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the "WWE Network" channel is installed
AND we have already logged into the WWE Network with an account
AND the Kinect is turned on
AND the Kinect recognizes the user
custom_steps: When we say "Xbox" on the Home Screen
custom_expected: Then we are presented with overlays over each tiles with the right audio command to access said tile

title: Voice: User is able to access media player controls after saying "Xbox" during a video in progress
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the "WWE Network" channel is installed
AND we have already logged into the WWE Network with an account
AND the Kinect is turned on
AND the Kinect recognizes the user
AND we are watching a video in progress
custom_steps:
When the user says "Xbox" during a video in progress
AND uses any of the voices commands shown for the media player

Test Points:
- Pause
- Play
- Rewind
- Forward
- Stop
custom_expected: Then the voice commands react to each correct command corresponding to the right action in the media player

title: Voice: During a video in progress, the user is able to say "Xbox WWE Home" and it will exit said video and present the user with the WWE Home Screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the "WWE Network" channel is installed
AND we have already logged into the WWE Network with an account
AND the Kinect is turned on
AND the Kinect recognizes the user
AND we are watching a video in progress
custom_steps: When we say "Xbox WWE Home"
custom_expected: Then the app will exit the video and bring the app back to the main home screen

title: If an application cannot establish a connection to a required non–Xbox Live server or web service, the application must display the appropriate message, specified in the Terminology List.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the "WWE Network" channel is installed
AND we have a valid xbox live gold account.
custom_steps:
1. Sign into a gamer profile and launch the application. 
2. From the home page, select Schedule. 
3. Arrange for the required non-Xbox Live web service to become unavailable. 
4. Select Today.
custom_expected: It is expected that the application displays the message specified in the terminology guide within 60 seconds of losing connection to the required non-Xbox Live web service.
